title: Menachem Bello
text:
Menachem 'Miko' Bello (; born December 26, 1947) is a former <a href="Israel">Israel</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender, who played for the <a href="Israel%20national%20football%20team">Israel national team</a> between 1965 and 1975. He was part of the Israel squad for the <a href="1970%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1970 World Cup</a>.
At club level, Bello played solely for <a href="Maccabi%20Tel%20Aviv%20F.C.">Maccabi Tel Aviv</a>
